name: Inspector Ooh: The Great Monkey Detective
summary: This is a 2005 game originally aired on the Playhouse Disney website, the game was inspired on the Ooh and Aah's bumper series called Inspector Ooh. In the game you need to find 3 things hidden in the stack of 3 pictures, you have 20 seconds to do each picture, but if you click on a banana, you gain more time. Also Ooh and give you a hint
